name: Escape Halloween Forest
description:
Escape Halloween Forest focuses on classic fun with a spooky twist! Collect all 5 gems to open a portal home. This short and casual game will get you in a festive mood! Collect pumpkins, travel through hedge mazes, leap across a forgotten swamp and more! Your adventure begins now with the perfect chills and thrills soundtrack to keep you company!




  • Gameplay Time: 1-3 hours
  • Over 12 thematic spooky music tracks
  • 7 different characters to help
  • Comical wholesome fun
